parsed.internal_thinking:
Analyzing the board for the first settlement placement. Alice has already taken a strong spot at node 20 (9, 5, 4), which gives her access to Brick 6, Sheep 8, and Wood 11. Since I am second in the turn order (Bob), I want a high-yield spot that provides essential early-game resources like Wood and Brick for expansion. 

Node 12 is an excellent choice: it touches Wood 3 (2 pips), Brick 6 (5 pips), and Sheep 5 (4 pips), totaling 11 pips. Getting on that Brick 6 is crucial because Brick is relatively scarce on this board. 

Alternatively, Node 43 has the highest pip count (13) with Wheat 6, 9, and 9, but it's very specialized. I'll prioritize the balanced resources of Node 12 to ensure I can build roads and settlements early. I'll plan to pick up Ore and more Wheat on my second placement. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Alice is on the Brick 6 and Sheep 8. I need to secure another Brick source or a good port soon. Node 12 gives me a share of that 6-Brick.
parsed.say_outloud: hey alice, that's a nice start. i'm going to set up on the 6-5-3 and see if i can keep up with those roads!
